name: 2223Y1C_Holland_SlimeRevenge
description:
It's slime for revenge! -

Play as a lone slime traversing many treacherous obstacles in order to enact revenge! What is he taking revenge on? Who knows!

Slime Revenge is a fast, rushed and in control 2D platformer game featuring:

  • 4 distinct levels, each with their own level mechanic.
  • 4 gym levels relating to the level mechanics.
  • An onboarding tutorial level which teaches basic movement.
  • An adorable, yet vengeful little slime!

Made as a year 1 block C student project at BUas by team 13, Holland.

Controls -

Playable using either controller or keyboard.
